attributes.action: Extra money for all key workers.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that due to the extra hours and the dangerous position that all key workers are working in at the moment to keep the nation going that they should either receive some sort of pay raise during the current time or a lum sum bonus at the end of this crisis.
attributes.background: During this crisis there are many peop who are putting the needs and health of others before there own. They are working extra long hours during an incredible dangerous and scary time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
